tables.name: public.users
tables.comment: ユーザー情報を格納するテーブル

indexes.name: users_pkey
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX users_pkey ON public.users USING btree (id)

indexes.name: users_email_unique
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX users_email_unique ON public.users USING btree (email)

driver.name: postgres
driver.database_version: PostgreSQL 14.17 (Homebrew) on aarch64-apple-darwin23.6.0, compiled by Apple clang version 16.0.0 (clang-1600.0.26.6), 64-bit
